document_data.name: Olive Oil
document_data.mainbody: '''Olive oil''' was a type of vegetable [[oil]], derived from the fruit known as [[olive]]s.{{Cite web/Realmslore/Uthmere (Part Three): Daily and Nightly Life in Uthmere}}

Availability.Beyond the Prime Material: * In the [[divine realm]] of [[Olympus]], the town of Thrassos was best known for its olive oil.<ref>

document_data.History: Olive oil had been around on [[Toril]] since at least the days of the ancient empire of [[Netheril]], where it could be found sold in its cities' markets.
document_data.Olive Oil Products:
* [[Broaz]], a type of dip, had olive oil as an ingredient.<ref>{{Cite web/theedverse/2019-01-05 - Dips in the Realms}}
* ''[[Oil of beauty]]''.<ref>
* [[Rouille]], a type of sauce, had olive oil as an ingredient.
* Olive oil was a primary ingredient of the [[olive oil crust pie]]s served at the [[Oak-Father's Boon]].

Notable Users.Businesses: * The [[Battlescarred Bard]], an inn in [[Trade Way]], utilized olive oil in its dish [[warriors' head]].<ref>
Notable Users.Regions & Settlements:
* In the village of [[Uthmere]], olive oil was one of many types of vegetable oils that inhabitants would cover their bodies in as a cleanser before bathing.
* Olive oil was a common facet of [[Turmish]] cuisine.<ref>{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2004)/Turmish Cuisine}}
